characters.name: Diablo
characters.description: Takuma Sakamoto (Sakamoto Takuma) a.k.a. Diablo (gamer tag: @Diablo-13) is the male protagonist of the series. He was a Cross Reverie player who controlled the character Diablo, known as the true Demon King. He always defeated players with better equipment and overwhelming skills, always holding back for being too strong. But one day he was invoked in another world, reincarnating in the body of his character, Diablo, finding two girls, a Pantherian and an elf, who claimed to have invoked him and that he should be a slave to one of them but due to his ring the magic back against them becoming slaves.

characters.name: Shera L Greenwood
alt_names: シェラ・L・グリーンウッド
characters.description:
Shera L. Greenwood is one of the female protagonists of the series. She is an Elf who is one of the two Summoners who summoned Diablo. The reason she summoned him was to have the strength to live free.

~!It was revealed later that she was actually an elven princess.!~

characters.name: Rem Galleu
characters.description:
Rem Galleu is one of the female protagonists of the series. She is a Pantherian who became an invoker and had no choice but to become an adventurer and continue to demonstrate its strength, saying to aim to exterminate the Demon King Krebskulm. 

~!It is later revealed that the soul of Krebskulm is sealed in her body and in case she dies the soul will be released.!~

characters.name: Edelgard
characters.description:
She is a short and beautiful demonic girl with brown skin (with the skin surface seeming like scales), long silver hair that reaches to her waist, and big golden eyes that have vertically torn pupils like that of a reptile with childish ambiance being felt from them.

(Source: How Not to Summon a Demon Lord Wiki)

characters.name: Sylvie
characters.description:
Being a Grasswalker, she has a petite frame with rabbit ears and tail.

She is the leader of the Adventurer's Guild.

characters.name: Alicia Crystella
alt_names: アリシア・クリステラ
characters.description: Alicia Crystella is an Imperial Knight. She was born as a daughter of a duke house.

characters.name: Mei
characters.description:
She is the Peace of Mind Inn's idol.

She exhibits an energetic happy-go-lucky persona when interacting with guests but can give out a threatening persona to put unruly people in their place. As long as she's facing a paying customer, she doesn't care about race or origin, whether Human, Pantheran, Demon or even Fallen, it doesn't matter to her. She further doesn't care what customers do in their rooms so long as they don't bother their neighbours, or cause property damage.

~! When Diablo openly declares his intent to "torture" Rem, and Rem objects, rather than be concerned about the torture, she's more concerned over Rem being too loud. !~

characters.name: Celestine Baudelaire
alt_names: セレステイーヌ・ボードレール
characters.description: Celestine Baudelaire is the head of the Made's Association in Faltra City.

characters.name: Emile Bichelberger
alt_names: エミール・ビュシェルベルジェール
characters.description: A human who is known as the strongest in the Adventurer's Guild.

characters.name: Krebskulm
alt_names: Demon Lord of the Soul Krebskulm
characters.description:
《Demon Lord of the Soul, Krebskulm》 is the ruler of the Fallen (Demonic Beings).

~!She was once one being with the other Demon Lords but were split apart after being defeated by God. She was sealed in Rem Galleu's ancestor and was passed down from mother to daughter up to Rem.!~

characters.name: Keera L. Greenwood
alt_names: キイラ・L・グリーンウッド
characters.description:
He is the crown prince of the Kingdom of Greenwood and the older brother of Shera L. Greenwood.
~!He was killed by Lieutenant General Chester Ray Galford. He was an antagonist of the series!~

characters.name: Chester Ray Galford
alt_names: チェスター・レイ・ガルフォード
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kingdom of Lyferia - Faltra City (Feudal Lord)
__Species:__ Human+

He's even more condescending, arrogant, and spiteful than Diablo. In addition, he's horribly racist, sexist, and petty, but he is an officially recognized hero who had a major role in the defeat of Demon King of the Brain, Enkvaros 30 years ago, in-universe, and does put the well being of the citizens of Faltra first. ​He constantly looks down on adventurers as a whole, especially Diablo. He's quick to insult and belittle them at any opportunity, despite the fact that the city only exists because the adventurer's guild took the demonic being attack head-on, while he was in his mansion doing nothing, and constantly go into danger to deal with threats that the local knights can't handle.

characters.name: Boris  Marcus
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kingdom of Lyferia - Faltra City
__Species:__ Human

 He is an infantryman of the Thirteenth Regiment of the Kingdom of Lyferia's Faltra stationed troops at Fort Bridge Ulug.

characters.name: Celsior
characters.description:
__Affiliation:__ Kingdom of Greenwood
__Species:__ Elf

He will obey the orders of the royalty, no matter how much he disagrees with it because he believes it's in the best interests of the kingdom.
 ~!Unfortunately, he's obeying the orders of Keera. He was strongly morally opposed to Keera's intentions towards Shera, but as the crown prince, Kiira's word is the law of the land in the Greenwood Kingdom. Selsio chose "lawful" and came to regret it, though choosing "good" wasn't likely to go very well either.!~

characters.name: Gregore
characters.description: he is a Fallen. He is a demonic being and combat wizard that was responsible for invading the city of Faltra and attacks it from inside while the army attacked from the outside, for that it used Galluk. ~!Gregore was the number one sorcerer in the Man-Eating Forest. He can fight both in hand to hand and magic. Extremely arrogant. He faced Emile, who he almost killed, but was defeated by Diablo.!~
